revised_title: Biosensors: Advanced Signal Processing Techniques for Fault-Tolerant Biosensor Arrays
tldr: This article discusses the development of fault-tolerant biosensor arrays and the importance of advanced signal processing techniques to improve their performance. The authors compare eleven outlier rejection procedures and analyze real data and computer simulations to determine the most appropriate methods for detecting faulty sensors in biosensor arrays. The study highlights the need for further advancements in signal processing to fully realize the potential of biosensors in process control.
